name: Nimbo
description:
warning: the game was originally not made for web browser

Nimbo is a puzzle platformer about a magician's apprentice who seeks to find the bottled clouds that have escaped by accident in order to complete the task given to him by his master.

Features
  • 24 designed puzzle levels.
  • 2 pixel art cutscenes.
  • Pixel-art graphics!
  • 15 - 30 min of gameplay.

There is a "skip level" button on the pause in case you get stuck or there is a bug (report bugs in the comments please).

Controls  Horizontal movement /SelectWASDJumpKCast magic / ConfirmJ

 ☁  made by DAMAZe  ☁

This game was created in order to push myself to finaly finish a project. I hope that you enjoy it and it motivates you to move forward with your own goals.
